plugins.name: 图表库 Chart Master
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows designers to quickly insert predefined design frames into their projects with just a click. It simplifies the process of applying consistent styles, layouts, and content, enhancing productivity and design consistency.


Features Introduction

•Insert predefined design frames with a single click.

•Automatically apply layout settings and styles to frames.

•Supports multiple language interfaces (English, Chinese, etc.).

•Real-time error notifications and fallbacks for seamless user experience.


How to Use

1.Open the Figma plugin and choose your desired design frame.

2.Click the insert button to add the frame to your design.

3.Customize the frame as needed—styles and layouts are already applied.

4.Switch languages via the plugin settings if required.


Notes

•Ensure all necessary fonts are installed to avoid fallback issues.

•If errors occur, check the console for detailed messages.

•Language settings can be changed anytime through the plugin interface.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件让设计师可以轻松地在项目中插入预定义的设计框架。通过简化应用一致的样式、布局和内容的过程，插件提高了生产力和设计一致性。


功能说明

•一键插入预定义的设计框架。

•自动应用框架的布局设置和样式。

•支持多语言界面（英语、中文等）。

•实时错误通知和回退功能，确保无缝用户体验。


使用方法

1.打开 Figma 插件，选择您需要的设计框架。

2.点击插入按钮，将框架添加到您的设计中。

3.根据需要自定义框架—样式和布局已自动应用。

4.如果需要，通过插件设置切换语言。


注意事项

•确保已安装所有必要的字体，以避免回退问题。

•如果发生错误，请检查控制台获取详细信息。

•可以随时通过插件界面更改语言设置。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Insert and Style Design Frames with a Click

plugins.name: WCAG 色彩对比检查 WCAG Color Checker
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin helps you evaluate the contrast ratio between text and background colors in your design frames, ensuring they meet WCAG accessibility standards. Perfect for designers aiming to improve readability and accessibility.


Function Introduction

•Check text-background contrast ratio within selected frames.

•Evaluate contrast according to WCAG standards (AAA, AA, A, Fail).

•Visualize contrast results and interact with your design directly.

•Automatic identification and highlighting of areas needing improvement.


Usage

1.Select a frame in your Figma file.

2.Run the plugin and click “Check Contrast.”

3.Review the results, which are sorted by contrast ratio.

4.Click on any result to highlight and improve specific text elements.


Notes

•Ensure text layers are properly named for better result identification.

•The plugin currently supports checking text against solid color backgrounds only.

•For best results, use the plugin on well-structured design frames.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件帮助您评估设计画板中文本与背景颜色之间的对比度，以确保其符合 WCAG 无障碍设计标准。非常适合希望提升可读性和无障碍性的设计师。


功能说明

•检查选定画板中文本与背景的对比度。

•根据 WCAG 标准评估对比度（AAA、AA、A、Fail）。

•可视化对比度结果并直接与设计交互。

•自动识别和突出显示需要改进的区域。


使用方法

1.在 Figma 文件中选择一个画板。

2.运行插件并点击“检查对比度”。

3.查看按对比度排序的结果。

4.点击任一结果以突出并改进特定的文本元素。


注意事项

•确保文本图层正确命名，以便更好地识别结果。

•插件目前仅支持检查与纯色背景的文本对比。

•为获得最佳效果，请在结构良好的设计画板上使用插件。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Quickly check and improve contrast ratios in Figma frames with one click.

plugins.name: VariableMaster - Swap Variables
plugins.description:
VariableMaster - Master all your variable workflows


Variable Master is your complete variable workflow solution for Figma. Switch variables between any libraries - local to published, published to local, or between different files. Whether you're swapping collections within the same file or moving components from one library to another, Variable Master makes it simple and fast.


Features :


- Swap variables between local and published libraries

- Switch collections between local variables

- Switch component variables from library A to library B easily

- Work with current selection, page, or entire file

- See what will change before you apply it

- Handle thousands of variables at once

- Pick which collections to swap or exclude specific variables


How to use :


1. Choose what to update (selection, page, or file) and pick your libraries from the drop down.

2. Select which collections to swap and see the preview.

3. Uncheck variables you don't want to change, then click on swap variables.


Ps : plugin picks libraries only if they are added in the File. You can add them to you file via Asset panel.


RoadMap :


- Find all variables used in your designs

- Export and import variable collections

- Check for design elements that need variables​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​


This Plugin is completely free to use, No charges for swapping variables.
plugins.tagline: Master all your variable workflows

136575.name: VariableMaster - Swap Variables
136575.description:
VariableMaster - Master all your variable workflows


Variable Master is your complete variable workflow solution for Figma. Switch variables between any libraries - local to published, published to local, or between different files. Whether you're swapping collections within the same file or moving components from one library to another, Variable Master makes it simple and fast.

- Swap variables between local and published libraries

- Switch collections between local variables

- Switch component variables from library A to library B easily

- Export and import variable collections

- Check for design elements that need variables​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​


This Plugin is completely free to use, No charges for swapping variables.

plugins.name: Layer Query
plugins.description:
A powerful layer selection plugin that lets you find and select layers based on their design properties and custom component properties. Perfect for managing large design files and design systems efficiently.


## Key Features


- Multi-property search with combination filters

- Custom component property support (boolean, text, variant, instance swap)

- Flexible search scope: Entire file, Current page, Root frame, or Selected frames

- Search results with page grouping and navigation

- Real-time search progress with cancellation support

- Cross-page layer selection and navigation


## Supported Properties


**Typography:** Font size, font family, line height, text alignment, text content

**Fill:** Fill color, opacity

**Size:** Width, height

**Padding:** All directions (top, bottom, left, right, vertical, horizontal)

**Auto Layout:** Direction, sizing, alignment, item spacing

**Stroke:** Stroke color, stroke width

**Corner Radius:** All corners and individual corner values

**Layer:** Layer name, structure, type, opacity

**Position:** X and Y coordinates

**Custom:** Component instance properties


## Perfect For


- Design system maintenance and auditing

- Finding layers with specific styling across large files

- Quality assurance and design consistency checks

- Efficient layer organization and cleanup

- Component property management


Save hours of manual searching with precise property-based queries. Transform your Figma workflow from manual hunting to smart selection.


## Beta Version


This plugin is currently in beta. Please report any issues or feedback to help improve the experience.
plugins.tagline: Query and select layers by properties including custom components. Advanced search for efficiency.

plugins.name: Dialekt
plugins.description:
Stop manually copy-pasting text for different languages! Dialekt helps you visualize localized designs early in your UX process. Simply select a mobile frame containing your text layers, and this plugin will:

  1. Find all text content within the selected frame.
  2. Automatically create five new frames, perfectly aligned.
  3. Translate the text in each new frame into Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, and French.

Ideal for designers working on multi-language apps who need to quickly see how text will look and fit in different languages during the wireframing or mockup stage.


Key Features:

  1. Translates text into 5 pre-set languages: Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, French.
  2. Automatically duplicates the selected frame for each language.
  3. Preserves original layout and styling (text length may vary).
  4. Simple few clicks operation.
plugins.tagline: Translate your designs into multiple languages

136509.name: Dialekt
136509.description:

Ideal for designers working on multi-language apps who need to quickly see how text will look and fit in different languages during the wireframing or mockup stage.

  4. Simple few clicks operation.
136509.tagline: Translate your designs into multiple languages

plugins.name: figma to testcase
plugins.description: Transform your Figma designs into comprehensive test cases with just a few clicks. This powerful plugin analyzes your UI elements and generates detailed test scenarios for functional, security, accessibility, and performance testing. Export your test cases directly to TestRail or Zephyr in CSV format, maintaining exact UI text and interactions. Perfect for designers, developers, and QA teams looking to streamline their testing workflow and ensure product quality.

plugins.name: Radix color palette
plugins.description:
Step 1: Enter a base color in the Accent section to generate a palette.

Step 2: Copy the accent scale generated below.

Step 3: Copy the CSS code from:

.root, .light, .light-theme { ... }

Step 4: Repeat Steps 1–3 for the Dark Theme.

Step 5: Create a collection in Figma with two modes named exactly: Light Mode, Dark Mode (Case-sensitive)

Step 6: Paste the Light and Dark theme CSS into their respective input fields in the plugin.

Step 7: Click the "Create Variables" button.

Step 8: Edit variable names as needed in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Copy Radix CSS code and paste it here to instantly add your custom palette variables to the file.

136337.name: Radix color palette

plugins.name: CSV to Table
plugins.description:
Convierte fácilmente archivos CSV en tablas dentro de Figma.


Con el plugin CSV to Table, importar datos a tus diseños nunca fue tan fácil. Simplemente selecciona tu archivo .csv y el plugin generará una tabla visual editable directamente en tu lienzo de Figma. Ideal para diseñadores de productos, equipos de UX/UI y presentaciones con datos reales.


🔹 Importa datos reales sin salir de Figma

🔹 Transforma automáticamente filas y columnas en capas de texto y formas

🔹 Personaliza estilos una vez importado

🔹 Sin necesidad de conexión a internet – tus datos permanecen seguros


Este recurso es completamente gratuito y no almacena tu información. Solo tú tienes acceso a los datos que importas.


---


Easily turn CSV files into tables inside Figma.


With the CSV to Table plugin, importing structured data into your designs is effortless. Just upload your .csv file, and this plugin will generate an editable table directly on your Figma canvas. Perfect for product designers, UX/UI teams, or anyone working with real data.


🔹 Import real data without leaving Figma

🔹 Automatically transforms rows and columns into styled text and shapes

🔹 Customize your table’s style after import

🔹 No internet connection needed – your data stays safe


This is a completely free community resource. Your data is never uploaded or stored externally.
plugins.tagline: Convierte CSV en tablas editables / Convert CSV files into editable Figma tables instantly.

plugins.name: ui-palette-generator
plugins.description:
Supply a primary color and the plugin will generate accessible light and dark themed ui color palettes. Each palette includes:


Palette

  1. Primary
  2. Secondary (primary analogous, complementary, split compliment left, or split compliment right)
  3. Success
  4. Warn
  5. Error
  6. Info


Background

  1. z0
  2. z1
  3. z2
  4. z3
  5. z4
  6. z5


Palette hover

  1. Primary
  2. Secondary
  3. Success
  4. Warn
  5. Error
  6. Info


Text

  1. base (either #000 or #fff)
  2. light (base @ 75% opacity)
  3. lighter (base @ 50% opacity)
  4. lightest (base @ 33% opacity)


Text on palette

  1. textBaseOnPrimary
  2. textLightOnPrimary
  3. textLighterOnPrimary
  4. textLightestOnPrimary
  5. etc


Clicking "Add to document" will add both the light and dark themes as variable modes. If you're using the free plan, only the selected theme is added.


The plugin UI provides a live preview of the generated palettes in use.
plugins.tagline: Generate accessible light and dark themed ui color palettes

136693.name: ui-palette-generator
136693.description:
Supply a primary color and the plugin will generate accessible light and dark themed ui color palettes. Each palette includes:


Palette

  1. Primary
  2. Secondary (primary analogous, complementary, split compliment left, or split compliment right)
  3. Success
  4. Warn
  5. Error
  6. Info


Background

  1. z0
  2. z1
  3. z2
  4. z3
  5. z4
  6. z5


Palette hover

  1. Primary
  2. Secondary
  3. Success
  4. Warn
  5. Error
  6. Info


Text

  1. base (either #000 or #fff)
  2. light (base @ 75% opacity)
  3. lighter (base @ 50% opacity)
  4. lightest (base @ 33% opacity)


Text on palette

  1. textBaseOnPrimary
  2. textLightOnPrimary
  3. textLighterOnPrimary
  4. textLightestOnPrimary
  5. etc


Clicking "Add to document" will add both the light and dark themes as variable modes. If you're using the free plan, only the selected theme is added.


The plugin UI provides a live preview of the generated palettes in use.
136693.tagline: Generate accessible light and dark themed ui color palettes

No more manual renaming. Just SAR it. 🚀

plugins.name: Artboard Theme Switcher
plugins.description:
A lightweight plugin for switching between light and dark themes while preserving your design work.


Hierarchical Color System

Automatically adjusts section colors based on nesting depth. Parent sections use your defined colors, while child sections receive calculated brightness adjustments (-10 for light mode, +10 for dark mode per level).


Frame Protection

Multi-layer protection ensures frames, components, and instances are never modified. Only page backgrounds and sections are affected.


Performance Optimized

48KB bundle with sub-200ms execution time. Uses efficient HSB color calculations for smooth operation.


How Hierarchical Coloring Works

  1. Light Mode: Child sections get progressively darker (-10 brightness per nesting level)
  2. Dark Mode: Child sections get progressively lighter (+10 brightness per nesting level)


This creates visual depth automatically without manual configuration. Frame content and designed elements remain completely protected.

accepted.name: Anmol Kumar
accepted.description: i skip meals to design stuff ✷

plugins.tagline: Easily Switch Between Dark and Light Colour themes for your Figma Pages and Sections

This creates visual depth automatically without manual configuration. Frame content and designed elements remain completely protected.

plugins.name: Section Template Manager
plugins.description:
Section Template Manager streamlines your daily workflow in FigJam by automatically duplicating template sections with today's date. Perfect for teams who use FigJam for daily stand-ups, retrospectives, or any recurring activities.


Key Features:

• One-click duplication - No UI, just instant action

• Automatic dating - New sections are named with today's date (YYYY-MM-DD)

• Smart organization - Existing dated sections automatically shift to maintain chronological order

• Template flexibility - Any section starting with "TEMPLATE" becomes a reusable template


How it works:

1. Create a section with a name starting with "TEMPLATE"

2. Run the plugin

3. Your template is duplicated with today's date, and existing sections are organized


Perfect for:

• Daily KPT (Keep/Problem/Try) retrospectives

• Team stand-up meetings

• Weekly reports and reviews

• Project status tracking

• Any recurring documentation needs


Save time and maintain consistency in your team's documentation workflow. No more manual copying or renaming - let Section Template Manager handle the repetitive tasks so you can focus on what matters.
plugins.tagline: Organize your daily sections with one click

plugins.name: 文案提取与替换 Text Extractor & Replacer
plugins.description:
介绍

文案提取与替换是一款高效实用的 Figma 插件，可快速提取选中元素中的文本，并支持批量修改与一键替换，适用于多语言版本设计、内容本地化与运营迭代场景。


功能说明

  1. 提取选中节点中的全部文本内容
  2. 自动合并重复文案并展示唯一列表
  3. 可逐条输入替换文案
  4. 支持一键替换全部或单条替换
  5. 支持复制原文案、一键恢复初始值
  6. 替换后自动更新当前原文显示


使用方法

  1. 选中一个或多个页面元素
  2. 点击【📋 提取选中文案】，展示全部原文案
  3. 输入对应的替换内容
  4. 点击【替换】按钮应用更改（可单条或全部替换）
  5. 点击【复制】获取原文，或点击【恢复】重填初始内容


注意事项

  1. 插件执行替换前需加载原文字体（已自动处理）
  2. 替换仅影响文本内容，不修改字体样式
  3. 替换基于精确匹配，请确保输入一致
  4. 请在提取前确保已选中有效节点


Introduction

Text Extractor & Replacer is a practical Figma plugin designed to help you quickly extract and batch replace text from selected elements—ideal for multi-language design workflows, localization, and content iteration.


Function Description

  1. Extract all text from selected nodes
  2. Display a unique list of original strings
  3. Edit replacements in a unified interface
  4. One-click replace for individual or all text
  5. Copy original text and restore initial values anytime
  6. Auto-update "original" label after each replacement


How to Use

  1. Select one or more elements in your Figma file
  2. Click 📋 Extract Text to list all unique texts
  3. Input replacement values next to each entry
  4. Click Replace (per-row or globally) to apply changes
  5. Use Copy to copy source text or Restore to revert input


Notes

  1. Font loading is required before text replacement (handled automatically)
  2. This plugin only replaces text values, not font styles
  3. Replacements are based on exact match
  4. Make sure to select nodes before extraction

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Quickly extract and replace text in bulk with ease

plugins.name: QR Code Automation
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to update / replace all QR codes in your Figma file with just one click! You have the total control over sizes, and Color!


How to use it:


  1. Create a text layer.
  2. Name the text layer "QR-Link". (You can change the content of this layer at any time — the name should remain "QR-Link".)
  3. Create one or multiple rectangles (squares) and name them "QR-Code".
  4. Create a second text layer
  5. Name the text layer "QR-color", and add the Hex code of the color you want your QR-Code to have inside the text layer.
  6. Run the Plugin


The plugin will generate a QR code using the content from the "QR-Link" text layer. It will place the QR code over each rectangle named "QR-Code" and match the dimensions of the rectangle. If the rectangle is inside a frame, the QR code will be placed inside that frame as well.


If you run the plugin again, the existing QR codes will be replaced with the updated ones.


Hint:

  1. It's not a problem if there are multiple text layers named "QR-Link" — just make sure that all of them contain the exact same text content. Otherwise, the plugin will not run.
  2. It does not matter if you add the Hex-code with or without the #
plugins.tagline: Auto update multiple QR-Codes with one click

134125.name: QR Code Automation
134125.description:
This plugin allows you to update / replace all QR codes in your Figma file with just one click! You have the total control over sizes, and Color!


How to use it:


  1. Create a text layer.
  2. Name the text layer "QR-Link". (You can change the content of this layer at any time — the name should remain "QR-Link".)
  3. Create one or multiple rectangles (squares) and name them "QR-Code".
  4. Create a second text layer
  5. Name the text layer "QR-color", and add the Hex code of the color you want your QR-Code to have inside the text layer.
  6. Run the Plugin


The plugin will generate a QR code using the content from the "QR-Link" text layer. It will place the QR code over each rectangle named "QR-Code" and match the dimensions of the rectangle. If the rectangle is inside a frame, the QR code will be placed inside that frame as well.


If you run the plugin again, the existing QR codes will be replaced with the updated ones.


Hint:

  1. It's not a problem if there are multiple text layers named "QR-Link" — just make sure that all of them contain the exact same text content. Otherwise, the plugin will not run.
  2. It does not matter if you add the Hex-code with or without the #
134125.tagline: Auto update multiple QR-Codes with one click

plugins.name: Polaroids
plugins.description:
Polaroids – Bring a Touch of Nostalgia to Your Designs

Transform any frame into a beautifully styled Polaroid image—in seconds.


Polaroid Maker is your go-to tool for adding a warm, analog vibe to digital designs. Whether you’re building a moodboard, designing a presentation, or crafting a portfolio, this plugin helps you wrap your visuals in the charm of vintage photography.


Features:

Adjustable Padding – Control the spacing for that perfect Polaroid balance.


Customizable Corner Radius – Keep it sharp or go rounded for a softer feel.


Handwritten-style Captions – Add personality with a built-in handwriting font.


Stacking Options – Single, double, or multiple cards for layered vibes.


Shadow Effects – Add subtle or dramatic depth with three shadow styles.


Polaroid Maker was built to make visual storytelling more tactile, expressive, and fun—without needing any design hacks or frame juggling.
plugins.tagline: Turn any frame into a clean, customizable Polaroid.

plugins.name: AutoLayout Direction Toggler
plugins.description: Not sure why Figma doesn’t have a built-in shortcut for this—so I made one. This plugin lets you quickly toggle Auto Layout direction and pair it with custom app shortcuts for faster workflows. But heads up: since plugin shortcuts aren't supported in this version, you'll still need to set up an OS-level app shortcut manually. Not ideal, but it works.
plugins.tagline: Switch Auto Layout direction instantly—hook it up with your own app shortcut for speed.

131143.tagline: Switch Auto Layout direction instantly—hook it up with your own app shortcut for speed.

plugins.name: push-my-icons
plugins.description:
Push your Figma SVG icons to GitHub with ease.


This plugin helps you

  1. Automatically extract SVG nodes
  2. Upload them to your GitHub repository
  3. Generate a pull request with added/updated/removed icons


How to Use

  1. Open the plugin and fill in the following fields:
  2. GitHub personal access token
  3. GitHub repository URL
  4. Target folder path in the repo (e.g., src/icons)
  5. Pull request title and description
  6. Select all frames that contain your SVG icon components.
  7. Each selected frame should be a top-level container for one or more SVGs.
  8. Click "Push" button.
  9. The plugin will:
  10. Export all SVGs found in the selected frames
  11. Upload them to the specified folder in your GitHub repo
  12. Create a pull request containing added, updated, or deleted icon files
plugins.tagline: Push selected Figma icons to GitHub in one click.

plugins.name: ThemePathPro
plugins.description:
Solution: ThemePathPro automates style path transformation in your Figma designs. Instantly swap all references from one path to another (e.g., 'M3/sys/dark/' to 'M3/sys/light/'), saving hours of manual work.


Features:

  1. Custom path definition and validation
  2. Apply to selections or entire pages
  3. Smart error handling and feedback
  4. Free and open source


Inspired by workflow challenges with Material Theme Builder, this plugin bridges a critical gap in Material Design workflow, helping designers quickly switch between theme variations.
plugins.tagline: ThemePathPro: Effortlessly Transform Style Paths

Inspired by workflow challenges with Material Theme Builder, this plugin bridges a critical gap in Material Design workflow, helping designers quickly switch between theme variations.

plugins.name: 文本样式导出器 TextStyle Exporter
plugins.description:
介绍

一键提取当前文件中的本地文本样式名称与对应的 key，便于跨文件引用和样式管理。


功能说明

  1. 获取当前 Figma 文件中所有本地文本样式
  2. 显示每个文本样式的名称与唯一 key
  3. 支持一键复制或查看 key，用于开发或样式映射


使用方法

  1. 打开包含本地文本样式的设计文件（建议为团队样式库）
  2. 选中任意节点（或不选中）并运行插件
  3. 点击“获取样式列表”按钮，即可查看所有样式及其 key


注意事项

  1. 插件仅能提取“本地文本样式”，不支持远程团队样式
  2. 请确保文件具有编辑权限，否则无法读取样式
  3. 建议在样式库文件中使用本插件效果最佳


Introduction

Quickly extract all local text style names and their unique keys from your current Figma file — ideal for style management and developer use.


Function Description

  1. Retrieve all local text styles in the current file
  2. Display each text style’s name and corresponding key
  3. Supports easy reference for cross-file usage or developer integration


How to Use

  1. Open the design file containing local text styles (preferably a team library)
  2. Run the plugin — selection is optional
  3. Click the “Fetch Style List” button to display names and keys


Notes

  1. Only local text styles are supported, not team styles from other files
  2. Ensure the file is editable to allow style access
  3. Recommended usage: in a shared style library file for best results

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Export local text styles with name and key

plugins.name: TrustLens
plugins.description: TrustLens is a simple and straightforward plugin for designers to spot potential deceptive patterns before they hit production. We aim to help reduce back and forth between product, design and trust & security teams helping you deliver exceptional experiences, while building Trust by Design.
plugins.tagline: Spot deceptive design patterns before they hit production. Build "trust by design" with TrustLens..

plugins.name: Layer Name Changer
plugins.description:
🔤 Layer Name Changer

Bulk layer renaming has never been easier! ✨

Layer Name Changer helps you quickly and efficiently rename multiple layers in your Figma file.


🚀 What You Can Do:

Instantly replace all layer names with the string you choose 🔁

Choose to rename within the current page or across the entire file 📄📁

Save time on large-scale projects ⏱️

Eliminate name clutter and stay organized 🧹


🎯 Who Is It For?

Perfect for design system managers, large team collaborators, or anyone who loves tidy files 💼🎨
plugins.tagline: Rename layers in bulk, effortlessly. Stay organized, work faster. 🔤

plugins.name: 字号缩放工具 (专业版) Font Size Scale (Pro)
plugins.description:
介绍

【字号缩放工具 (专业版) Font Size Scale (Pro)】是一款高级 Figma 插件，可帮助设计师精确快捷地缩放文本字号，有效提升设计工作效率。


功能说明

本插件提供两种缩放模式：连续缩放与阶梯缩放。连续缩放通过比例调整文本字号，而阶梯缩放则允许按固定数值（例如增加或减少 1、2、3）对字号进行调整。此外，对于包含文本的画板、组或框架，插件还会自动在名称后追加缩放后缀，方便后续管理。


使用方法

1.选择包含文本的图层、画板或组。

2.通过点击不同的 Tab，选择“连续缩放”或“阶梯缩放”。

3.在连续缩放模式下，通过滑块调整缩放比例；在阶梯缩放模式下，通过自定义数字输入控件输入步长数值。

4.点击“应用缩放”按钮来执行操作。

5.请确保所有所需的字体均已加载。


注意事项

•请确保选区中包含文本节点。

•本插件支持单个文本层以及含文本的容器。

•在对大范围设计进行缩放时，请注意可能引起的布局调整。


Introduction

Font Size Scale (Pro) is an advanced Figma plugin for scaling text sizes with precision and ease. It enables designers to update text sizes quickly, streamlining your design workflow.


Function Description

This plugin provides two scaling modes: continuous scaling and step-wise scaling. The continuous mode adjusts font sizes by a ratio, while the step-wise mode increases or decreases font sizes by fixed increments. In addition, any frames or groups that contain text are renamed with a suffix that indicates the applied scale change.


Usage

1.Select the text layers, frames, or groups you wish to scale.

2.Choose the desired scaling mode by clicking on the corresponding tab.

3.For continuous scaling, adjust the scale ratio via the slider; for step-wise scaling, use the custom number input to specify the step value.

4.Click the “Apply Scale” button to perform the scaling operation.

5.Make sure that all necessary fonts are loaded.


Notes

•Ensure that your selection includes text nodes.

•Both standalone text layers and containers that hold text are supported.

•When scaling large designs, review your layout as some adjustments might affect the overall design consistency.

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Step-wise font scaling for pro design.

plugins.name: RatioRects
plugins.description:
Proportional Rectangle Generator is a Figma plugin designed specifically for designers, aimed at simplifying rectangle creation and sizing processes. Through intelligent proportion calculation and an intuitive interface, it helps designers quickly generate precise and consistent rectangular shapes.


Feature Highlights ✨

Precision Design Tools

🎯 Accurate Proportion Calculation

📐 Diverse Proportion Selection

🔄 Bidirectional Size Inference

📱 Supports Horizontal and Vertical Orientation Switching

Smart Design Assistance

🖌 Real-time Visual Preview

🎨 Intelligent Background Color Adaptation

✂️ Adjustable Selected Graphics

🖥 Rich Preset Proportion Library
plugins.tagline: Generate proportional rectangles with a single click, simplifying designers' size calculations.
